short_description: A land of contrasts, Japan offers a unique travel experience that blends ancient traditions with modern innovation. Explore the bustling streets of Tokyo, soak in the natural hot springs of Hakone, and indulge in the fresh flavors of Japanese cuisine, from sushi to ramen. Don't miss the chance to witness the stunning cherry blossom season.

tipping.hotels: Only tip in very high end hotels and offer a small amount discretely in an envelope not directly
tipping.guides: You can tip your tour guide, but it isn't mandatory, or expected
tipping.restaurants: Tipping is uncommon as the pricing is supposed to already reflect the service quality
tipping.taxis: You don't need to tip your taxi driver in Japan

weather.title: Japan has a varied climate due to its geographical location. The northern regions have a humid continental climate with cold winters and warm summers, while the southern regions have a subtropical climate with mild winters and hot, humid summers. It experiences a rainy season, known as 'tsuyu,' in June and July

when_to_visit.title: Cherry blossom season
when_to_visit.short_description: Cherry trees bloom with beautiful pink and white flowers every Spring. Weather is mild and pleasant, drawing crowds to witness the season in cities like Tokyo, Kyoto and Hiroshima

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Hot and humid, especially in central and southern regions. Can also be rainy with frequent showers and occasional typhoons. Good time to visit Hokkaido in the north where the weather is cooler

when_to_visit.title: For winter sport
when_to_visit.short_description: Colder temperatures and snowfall in northern regions, perfect for skiing and snowboarding

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (March to May), Autumn (September to November)
when_to_visit.short_description: Spring and autumn are considered the best times to visit with mild and pleasant temperatures. Great to experience changing colors in Japan

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Japan depends on the region, but generally, the months of March to May and September to November offer pleasant temperatures and beautiful cherry blossom or autumn foliage views
